Description:
Detects a successful export of an Exchange mailbox to untypical directory or with aspx name suffix which can be used to place a webshell or the needed role assignment for it

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Rich Warren, Christian Burkard (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Mailbox Export to Exchange Webserver
Query: sourcetype='windows-msexchange-management' eql select * from _source_ where ((( = 'new-mailboxexportrequest' and  = ' -mailbox ') and Query('-FilePath "\\\\ OR .aspx')) or ( = 'new-managementroleassignment' and  = ' -role "mailbox import export"' and  = ' -user '))
